title: Corn harvester right in the field the daily life of farmers #farm #dailylife harvester

tasks.task: Drive a combine through a soybean field.
subtasks: Start the combine engine.
Operate the steering wheel to guide the combine.
Monitor the combine’s harvest process.
Adjust the combine’s settings as needed.

tasks.task: Inspect harvested soybeans in the combine's bin.
subtasks: Open the combine's bin door.
Remove a sample of soybeans for inspection.
Check the moisture content of the beans.
Determine if further drying is necessary.

tasks.task: Transfer soybeans from the combine to a waiting tractor trailer.
subtasks: Attach a auger or conveyor belt to the combine.
Operate the auger/belt to load the soybeans.
Weigh the loaded trailer to check capacity.
Repeat until the trailer is full.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor trailer to a designated location.
subtasks: Back the trailer up to a scale for weighing.
Roll the trailer’s wheels over the scale.
Note the weight and decide if more loading is needed.

tasks.task: Securely strap down the loaded soybeans on the trailer.
subtasks: Position baling twine or straps around the load.
Tighten the straps to prevent shifting.
Check load stability and security.

tasks.task: Transport the trailer to the farm storage facility.
subtasks: Drive the tractor onto a roadway.
Navigate the trailer to the farm’s grain storage area.
Park the trailer next to the storage bins.

tasks.task: Unload the soybeans from the trailer into the bin towers.
subtasks: Detach the trailer from the tractor.
Use a newSizeift or auger to unload the beans into the bin.
Repeat until all trailers are unloaded.

tasks.task: Monitor the grain bins for any issues.
subtasks: Check for signs of grain settling or bridging.
Ensure proper aeration is maintained.
Watch for leaks or other structural problems.

tasks.task: Perform basic maintenance checks on the combine and tractor.
subtasks: Lubricate moving parts of the equipment.
Check tire pressure and make adjustments.
Refill fluid levels as necessary.
